description.zh-cn: 中国共产党及中华人民共和国政治人物、当代作家，副国级党和国家领导人。现任第十四届全国人大常委会副委员长、中国文学艺术界联合会主席。曾任中国作家协会主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician and contemporary writer, currently serving as a vice chairperson of the Standing Committee of the 14th National People's Congress and the chairperson of the China Federation of Literary and Art Circles. She is a party and state leader of vice-national level and previously served as the chairperson of the China Writers Association.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会副委员长

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会副委员长
en: Vice Chairperson of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会常务委员会的副职领导人，属国家级副职。
description.en: The deputy leader of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China, a position of Vice National level.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长。
description.en: Chinese politician, serving as the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国文学艺术界联合会

zh-cn: 中国文学艺术界联合会
en: China Federation of Literary and Art Circles

description.zh-cn: 中国文学艺术工作者的全国性人民团体。
description.en: A national people's organization for Chinese literary and art workers.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国文学艺术界联合会主席，是铁凝的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Chairman of the China Federation of Literary and Art Circles, the predecessor to Tie Ning.

description.zh-cn: 中国各民族作家自愿结合的专业性人民团体。
description.en: A professional people's organization voluntarily formed by writers of all ethnic groups in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代文学家，曾任中国作家协会主席，是铁凝的前任。
description.en: A modern Chinese writer who served as the Chairman of the China Writers Association, the predecessor to Tie Ning.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国作家协会党组书记，是铁凝在中国作家协会主席职位上的继任者。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Party Group Secretary of the China Writers Association, and the successor to Tie Ning as Chairman of the China Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国河北省保定市的一所中学，是铁凝的母校。
description.en: A middle school located in Baoding, Hebei Province, China, and the alma mater of Tie Ning.

description.zh-cn: 画家，铁凝的父亲，毕业于中央戏剧学院。
description.en: A painter, father of Tie Ning, and a graduate of the Central Academy of Drama.

description.zh-cn: 经济学家，燕京华侨大学校长，铁凝的丈夫。
description.en: An economist, president of Yanjing Overseas Chinese University, and the husband of Tie Ning.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在中国北京的一系列由学生主导的示威活动，最终以武力清场结束。
description.en: A series of student-led demonstrations in Beijing, China in 1989, which ended with a military crackdown.

description.zh-cn: 中国河北省的作家专业团体。
description.en: The professional organization for writers in Hebei Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中共中央总书记、中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, serving as the General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and President of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 墨西哥总统权力交接仪式

zh-cn: 墨西哥总统权力交接仪式

description.zh-cn: 墨西哥新任总统就职的官方典礼。
description.en: The official ceremony for the inauguration of the new President of Mexico.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的戏剧艺术高等教育机构。
description.en: An institution of higher education in dramatic arts located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 一所位于中国北京的大学。
description.en: A university located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 负责管理法国国家博物馆和古迹，推广和保护法国艺术和文化的法国政府部门。
description.en: The ministry of the Government of France in charge of national museums and monuments, promoting and protecting the arts and culture in France.

description.zh-cn: 由中国作家协会主办的中国具有最高荣誉的文学奖项之一。
description.en: One of China's most prestigious literary awards, sponsored by the China Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 北京市文学艺术界的最高奖项，以中国现代著名作家老舍命名。
description.en: The highest award in Beijing's literary and art circles, named after the famous modern Chinese writer Lao She.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会委员

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会委员
en: Member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构成员。
description.en: A member of the central leadership body of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会副委员长

description.zh-cn: 2023年3月10日，在第十四届全国人民代表大会上，铁凝当选为全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: On March 10, 2023, at the 14th National People's Congress, Tie Ning was elected as a Vice Chairperson of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 铁凝担任全国人大常委会副委员长，直接向时任委员长赵乐际负责。
description.en: As a Vice Chairperson of the NPC Standing Committee, Tie Ning reports directly to Chairman Zhao Leji.

relationships.target: 中国文学艺术界联合会

description.zh-cn: 自2016年12月起，铁凝担任中国文学艺术界联合会主席。
description.en: Since December 2016, Tie Ning has served as the Chairperson of the China Federation of Literary and Art Circles.

description.zh-cn: 自1985年起担任中国作家协会理事，1996年底当选为副主席，2006年11月12日起担任主席，预计于2025年3月卸任。
description.en: She has been a council member of the China Writers Association since 1985, was elected Vice Chairperson at the end of 1996, and has served as Chairperson since November 12, 2006, with her term expected to end in March 2025.

description.zh-cn: 铁凝接替孙家正，当选为中国文学艺术界联合会主席。
description.en: Tie Ning succeeded Sun Jiazheng as the Chairperson of the China Federation of Literary and Art Circles.

description.zh-cn: 铁凝接替巴金，当选为中国作家协会主席。
description.en: Tie Ning succeeded Ba Jin as the Chairperson of the China Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 张宏森将接替铁凝担任中国作家协会主席。
description.en: Zhang Hongsen is set to succeed Tie Ning as the Chairperson of the China Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 铁凝于1957年9月出生于北京。
description.en: Tie Ning was born in Beijing in September 1957.

description.zh-cn: 铁凝于1975年11月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Tie Ning joined the Communist Party of China in November 1975.

description.zh-cn: 屈铁扬是铁凝的父亲。
description.en: Qu Tieyang is the father of Tie Ning.

description.zh-cn: 铁凝于2007年与经济学家华生结婚。
description.en: Tie Ning married economist Hua Sheng in 2007.

description.zh-cn: 六四事件后，时任河北文联主席的铁凝是第一个公开表态支持武力镇压的省文联主席。
description.en: After the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, Tie Ning, then chairperson of the Hebei Federation of Literary and Art Circles, was the first provincial-level chairperson to publicly support the military crackdown.

description.zh-cn: 习近平任命铁凝为国家主席特使，出席墨西哥总统权力交接仪式。
description.en: Xi Jinping appointed Tie Ning as his special presidential envoy to attend the Mexican presidential inauguration.

relationships.target: 墨西哥总统权力交接仪式

description.zh-cn: 铁凝作为国家主席习近平特使出席了墨西哥总统权力交接仪式。
description.en: Tie Ning attended the Mexican presidential inauguration as the special envoy of President Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 法国文化部向铁凝颁发艺术与文学骑士勋章。
description.en: The French Ministry of Culture awarded Tie Ning the Ordre des Arts et des Lettres (Knight).

description.zh-cn: 铁凝于1997年和2002年两次获得鲁迅文学奖。
description.en: Tie Ning won the Lu Xun Literary Prize twice, in 1997 and 2002.

description.zh-cn: 铁凝于2002年凭借中篇小说《永远有多远》获得老舍文学奖。
description.en: Tie Ning won the Lao She Literary Award in 2002 for her novella 'How Long is Forever'.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会委员

description.zh-cn: 铁凝是中共第十八届、十九届、二十届中央委员。
description.en: Tie Ning is a member of the 18th, 19th, and 20th Central Committees of the Communist Party of China.
